articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Thanks to Chinese President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Thanks to Chinese President
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a message of thanks to Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on Friday.
					 The message says:
					
					 At this moment when leaving for home after winding up my visit to China, the friendly neighbor, I express deep thanks to you, close comrades of the collective leadership of the CPC and cadres and people of Beijing, Tianjin, Liaoning Province, Dalian and Shenyang for warmly greeting us and according cordial hospitality to us.
					
					 During our visit we could see for ourselves the world-startling achievements made by the Chinese people after doing away with the centuries-old backwardness through strenuous efforts to put into practice the scientific outlook on development and the spirit of the 17th Congress of the CPC and feel once again the particular and sincere friendship of the Chinese people towards us.
					
					 I am satisfied with the fact that in the course of meetings this time I reconfirmed the steadfast resolution and will to further deepen the understanding and trust and develop on a new higher stage the traditional DPRK-China friendship, a precious legacy and common asset handed down to us by the revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 It is my belief that the DPRK-China friendship deeply enshrined by the peoples of the two countries would grow stronger and develop generation after generation full of fresh vim and vigor thanks to the joint efforts of the two parties and two peoples.
					
					 I hope that the fraternal Chinese people would ensure stable and sustainable development of the country and make greater progress in building a comprehensively well-off and harmonious socialist society under the leadership of the CPC with you as general secretary and, at the same time, sincerely wish you good health.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Makes Unofficial Visit to Northeastern China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Makes Unofficial Visit to Northeastern China
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il paid an unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China at the invitation of Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the PRC, from May 3 to 7.
					 Party and state leaders and people of China accorded with utmost sincerity warm welcome and cordial hospitality to leader Kim Jong Il who visited China again for boosting the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Kim Jong Il toured the northeastern part of China.
					
					 The first leg of his visit was Dalian City in the southern part of Liaoning Province.
					
					 He was warmly greeted in Dalian by Li Keqiang, standing member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and vice-premier of the State Council, upon the authorization of Hu Jintao and the CPC Central Committee.
					
					 Also present there were Wang Min, secretary of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the CPC; Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; Liu Zhijun, minister of Railways; Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK; Chen Zhenggao, governor of Liaoning Province; Xia Deren, secretary of the Dalian City Committee of CPC; Li Wancai, mayor of Dalian; and other leading party and government officials of the capital and Liaoning Province and Dalian City.
					
					 Kim Jong Il met and had a talk with Li Keqiang. 
					
					 On behalf of Hu Jintao and the CPC Central Committee and the State Council, Li Keqiang warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il to Dalian which was visited by President Kim Il Sung in 1983. 
					
					 Noting that the five visits paid by Kim Jong Il to China in the new century clearly prove how much he values the DPRK-China friendship provided and fostered by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries, Li Keqiang highly praised him for having made a great contribution to steadily boosting the China-DPRK friendship.
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people have achieved spectacular successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the reunification of the country and in foreign affairs and other fields, Li said, adding that the Chinese people are rejoiced over these achievements as over their own and sincerely hail them.
					
					 The collective leadership of China including Hu Jintao is attaching utmost importance to the China-DPRK friendship, he said, re-clarifying the steadfast stand of the Chinese party and government to steadily boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that he was very pleased to see for himself while visiting China the progress made by Dalian City making a new history of modernization in the land of China through its hard struggle. He expressed thanks to the leading officials and people of Liaoning Province and Dalian City for warmly welcoming him.
					
					 Li Keqiang gave a grand banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Conducted by leading officials of the capital, province and city including Li Keqiang, Wang Min, Wang Jiarui, Liu Zhijun, Liu Hongcai, Chen Zhenggao, Xia Deren and Li Wancai,  Kim Jong Il visited several units and commanded the night bird's-eye view of Dalian City whose appearance has undergone a remarkable change.
					
					 He visited the Dalian Bingshan Group, the Dalian Locomotive Production Company, the Liaoning Fishery Group and the Dalian Xuelong Industry Group all in the process of technological updating and congratulated the workers of those industrial establishments on the successes made in building a great many structures to go down in the history of the country. 
					
					 Noting that he was deeply impressed to see the changes that have taken place in Dalian City making harmonious progress at the level of cutting-edge science full of energy after doing away with the centuries-old backwardness, he said that the rapid development made by the northeastern region including Dalian City clearly proves the validity and vitality of the strategy for developing the northeastern region laid down by the Chinese party and government.
					
					 Wang Min hosted a grand banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il visiting Dalian City, and Liaoning Province and Dalian City presented him with gifts.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed thanks to Li Keqiang for having kindly greeted him in Dalian City far away from Beijing despite the pressure of his work, given a grand banquet and provided every sincerity and convenience by accompanying him in the whole period of his visit. He also thanked leading officials of the province and the city for having accorded sincere and cordial hospitality to him. 
					
					 The next leg of his visit was Tianjin, one of China's four municipalities, which is situated in the northeastern part of the plains of Huapei.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was greeted by Zhang Gaoli, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and secretary of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC, Huang Xingguo, mayor of Tianjin, and other party and government leading officials of the municipality.
					
					 He had a cordial talk with Zhang Gaoli.
					
					 Zhang Gaoli said it was a great honor of Tianjin Municipality that Kim Jong Il visited again the municipality associated with the giant footprints of President Kim Il Sung, a close friend of the Chinese people, and warmly welcomed his visit to the municipality. 
					
					 Saying that Kim Jong Il's current visit to China is another event of historic significance in the development of the bilateral relations,   Zhang Gaoli expressed deep respect for him who has made great efforts to strengthen and develop the Sino-Korean friendship.
					
					 He highly appreciated what the Korean people have done in building a great prosperous and powerful nation and briefed the Korean guests on the development of Tianjin Municipality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, conducted by Zhang Gaoli, Wang Jiarui, Huang Xingguo, Liu Hongcai and other senior officials of China and the municipality, visited Tianjin Port.
					
					 After looking round the port, which has turned into a large-scale, modern one, and the city full of vim and vigor, he expressed great appreciation of the tremendous changes undergone by the city in years and warmly congratulated the leading officials and working people of the city on their wonderful achievements.
					
					 Zhang Gaoli arranged a grand banquet at a state guesthouse to welcome Kim Jong Il's visit to the municipality.
					
					 The leader of the DPRK received a sincere and warm welcome from Chinese people wherever he went in China.
					
					 Touring northeastern China, he acquainted himself with the thought and sentiments of the diligent and intelligent Chinese people and the economic, cultural and all other sectors there.
					
					 The unofficial visit to the PRC paid by him this time for the continued development of the DPRK-China friendship was successfully conducted thanks to the particular care and cordial hospitality shown by Hu Jintao and the Chinese party and government.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed satisfaction over the result of his visit and extended heartfelt thanks to the leading cadres of the Chinese party and government for their cordial hospitality.
					
					 During his visit to China he was accompanied by Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Yong Chun who is also vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, Secretaries of the WPK Central Committee Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kang Sok Ju, Department Directors Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon and First Vice Department Director Ju Kyu Chang of the WPK Central Committee, Department Directors of the NDC of the DPRK Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, Chief Secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK Kim Phyong Hae and Chief Secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Condolence Message to Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Condolence Message to Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of condolence to Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president of Nigeria, over the death of Alhaji Umaru Musa Yaradua, its former president.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences to the president and, through him, to the Nigerian people and the bereaved families and hoped that the government and people of Nigeria would overcome sorrow and achieve continued development and prosperity.

articles.title: Condolatory Visit Paid to Nigerian Embassy
articles.content:
Condolatory Visit Paid to Nigerian Embassy
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Foreign Trade, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs sent wreaths to the Nigerian embassy here on Friday in memory of Alhaji Umaru Musa Yaradua, president of Nigeria. 
					 Wreaths were laid before the photo of the deceased.
					
					 Visiting the embassy were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Mun Jae Chol, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Nigeria Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased and made an entry in the mourner's book.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of different countries here also visited the Nigerian embassy on the same day to mourn the death of the president.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin hosted a reception on Friday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair to Open
articles.content:
Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair to Open
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair will take place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from May 17 to 20.
					 It will bring together more than 270 companies of the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany, Mongolia, Brazil, Switzerland, Singapore, Australia, Austria, Italy, Indonesia, Thailand, Cuba, Poland and Taipei of China.
					
					 Exhibits will include more than 85,000 products of over 5,000 kinds such as CNC machine tools, electrical machinery and equipment, electronic and light industrial goods, foodstuffs, daily necessities, medicines and vehicles.

articles.title: May 21 Architectural Festival Held
articles.content:
May 21 Architectural Festival Held
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The 10th May 21 architectural festival took place here from May 4 to 7.
					 The festival involved a prize contest in city layout planning, dwelling house interior designing and hotel interior designing, a public presentation of scientific papers on architecture and construction and a contest in architectural design programs and multi-media creation. 
					
					 Entries into the festival included valuable papers conducive to developing the nation's architectural and construction science and technology, architectural design programs and multi-media worked out by use of latest IT means and etc.
					
					The participants showed keen interest in province, city, county seat layout plans which vividly show the appearance of streets and villages of socialist fairyland and designs of various dwelling houses and hotels of diverse styles making formative art representation of elements and contents of the architectural formation.
					
					 A closing ceremony was held at the People's Palace of Culture           on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful at Asia Junior Judo
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful at Asia Junior Judo
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK proved successful at the 2010 Asia Junior Judo Championships.
					 The championships brought together more than 250 judokas from 18 countries and regions of Asia. 
					
					 Ri Un Ju and Hwang Ryu Ok of the DPRK each came first in the women's 52kg and 48kg category events.

articles.title: Azolla Filiculoides Used for Stockbreeding, Fish Farming
articles.content:
Azolla Filiculoides Used for Stockbreeding, Fish Farming
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Biology Branch under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK have made substitute feed for domestic animals and fishes by fermenting Azolla filliculoidas.
					 Azolla filliculoidas is a perennial plant floating on river, lake, pond, etc.
					
					 The feed made with the plant promotes appetite and digestion of domestic animals and fishes. 
					
					 In particular the feed makes it possible to economize grain fodder of domestic animals including pig, duck and chicken by 30 percent and fishes including catfish and rainbow trout by 50 percent.
					
					 Azolla filliculoidas is richer than other feeding crops in protein content. It contains 22.2 percent of crude protein, 2.8 percent of crude fat, 26.4 percent of crude fiber, various kinds of vitamins and salt.
					
					 It, which is rapid in propagation and good in adaptability, has been widely cultivated in the country. 
					
					 The substitute feed is paying off in many livestock and fish farms of the country.

articles.title: Gold Terrapin
articles.content:
Gold Terrapin
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The River Ryesong basin in Singye County of North Hwanghae Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is a habitat of gold terrapin.
					 The residents of the area have long used the animal for not only food but medicine because it is good for the treatment of hypertension, hepatitis and other diseases.
					
					 They call it gold terrapin comparing its color and efficacy with gold.
					
					 It is little different from other species of terrapin in appearance and habit but its yellow color is deeper than others and its yellow stripes are clear-cut.
					
					 It mates from late May to early June and lays eggs from late June to mid-August.
					
					It hibernates under sandy mud from mid-October to early April when the water temperature goes down below 10 degrees centigrade.
					
					 It, which lives for 40-50 years, weighs one kilogram on the average when attaining its full growth.
					
					 Thanks to the nature conservation policy of the Workers' Party of Korea the basin of the river was designated as a terrapin reserve in June Juche 92 (2003) to multiply the animal.

articles.title: Normalization of Relations between Japan and DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Normalization of Relations between Japan and DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government is getting evermore undisguised in its hostile moves against the DPRK instead of making an apology for aggression against Korea and colonial rule over it in the past.
					 Hirohachiro Kaku, co-representative of the Solidarity of Citizens in Osaka Prefecture Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK, said this when interviewed by a KCNA reporter before flying back home after winding up his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 It is the violation of the rights of the Korean students to exclude the Korean schools in Japan from the list of state assistance to senior high schools, he said, adding:
					
					 The right to education should be equally applied to all the students.
					
					 There is no reason why the Korean schools for the children of Koreans in Japan should be excluded from the list.
					
					 The government is bedeviling the relations between Japan and the DPRK by distorting history and raising the "abduction issue".
					
					 It has fostered extreme horror among the Japanese people while describing the satellite launch of the DPRK as "a missile launch" and taken hard-line stand against the DPRK while taking issue with its successful nuclear test.
					
					 It does not think at all what crimes Japan committed against Koreans in the past.
					
					 The Japanese government should stop the hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 Many Japanese people are now trying to have proper understanding of the DPRK whose people are all out in socialist construction based on the Juche idea.
					
					 I think it is important for them to visit the DPRK and see for themselves the reality here.
					
					 We will dynamically conduct activities for the normalization of the relations between the two countries together with personages of different circles of Japan and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: DR Congo Association Issues Statement
articles.content:
DR Congo Association Issues Statement
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Working Citizens Association of the Democratic Republic of Congo issued a statement on April 26 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 Noting that it is the tragedy of the Korean people and the world's progressives who love peace that Korea has not yet been reunified though more than half a century has passed since its partition into the north and the south, the statement went on:
					
					 The U.S., a signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement, is posing constant military threat to the DPRK and applying economic sanctions against it.
					
					 But the Korean people have turned the DPRK into a politico-military and socio-economic power by embodying the Juche idea, the Songun idea, which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and has been developed in depth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The association called on the leaders of various countries and media of the world to make every possible effort to support the independent reunification of Korea and ensure that the KAA concluded in 1953 is replaced by a peace treaty and the moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK are brought to an end. 
					
					 The U.S. administration should take practical measures to create an environment favorable for durable peace on the Korean Peninsula and Korea's reunification and put an end to the unfair sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Party Supports Foreign Ministry Memorandum
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Party Supports Foreign Ministry Memorandum
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party released a statement on April 30 in support of the memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement made it clear that the DPRK is willing to join in the international efforts for nuclear non-proliferation and safe handling of nuclear substance on an equal footing with other nuclear weapons states.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. imperialists have persisted in their moves hostile toward the DPRK, it noted, adding that the war maneuvers for invasion of the DPRK being staged in south Korea are a challenge to the Korean nation's cause of peace and a main factor of escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Expressing belief that the DPRK will join in the international efforts for nuclear disarmament on an equal footing with other nuclear weapons states, the statement declared that the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party would as ever support the just cause of the Korean people led by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Reminiscences Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Reminiscences Published in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Vol. 8 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of President 
					Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" (continuing edition) was published in Bulgaria.
					 A releasing ceremony was held at a printing house on April 29. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Bulgarian national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of the President, the Bulgarian Communists Union and the printing house and other Bulgarians.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the union, and other speakers praised the revolutionary history of the President as a great treasure for progressive humankind and an encyclopedia always indicating the path of the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 7 un mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					En este momento de regresar a la patria al concluir mi visita a China, vecino amistoso, expreso a Usted, los intimos camaradas del colectivo de direccion central del PCCh, los cuadros y habitantes de las ciudades de Beijing, Tianjin, Dalian y Shenyang y de la provincia de Liaoning que nos trataron con gran hospitalidad.
					
					Durante la visita, hemos sido testigos presenciales de los exitos asombrosos para todo el mundo que logra el pueblo chino eliminando el atraso secular a traves de su lucha perseverante por poner en practica la concepcion del desarrollo cientifico y el espiritu del XVII Congreso del PCCh y, al mismo tiempo, volvimos a sentir la camaraderia especial y sincera del pueblo chino con nosotros.
					
					Estoy satisfecho de que en los encuentros de esta vez, haya ensanchado el entendimiento y la confianza y reafirmado la firme decision y voluntad de desarrollar en la nueva etapa mas alta la tradicional amistad Corea-China, valiosa riqueza comun heredada de los revolucionarios antecesores.
					
					Estoy seguro de que la amistad Corea-China arraigada profundamente en el alma de los pueblos de los dos paises se fortalecera y se desarrollara magnificamente de generacion en generacion cobrando nueva vitalidad y vigor gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de los partidos y los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que el hermano pueblo chino garantice el desarrollo estable y sostenido del pais y logre mayores exitos en la construccion de la sociedad socialista armoniosa y basicamente acomodada bajo la direccion del PCCh, que le tiene a Usted como Secretario General, y que Usted tenga buena salud.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il realiza visita no oficial a la region nordeste de la RPCh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il realiza visita no oficial a la region nordeste de la RPCh
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo del 3 al 7 del mes corriente una visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China cumplimentando la invitacion de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del CC del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					Los dirigentes del partido y el Estado y el pueblo de China dieron una calida bienvenida al Dirigente, quien volvio a visitar a China por el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la amistad Corea-China, y le trataron con maxima sinceridad y suma hospitalidad.
					
					El Dirigente visito la region nordeste de la RPCh.
					
					Ante todo, recorrio la ciudad de Dalian situada en la parte meridional de la provincia de Liaoning.
					
					Por encargo del Secretario General Hu Jintao y el CC del PCCh, Li Keqiang, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Estado, acogio con amabilidad al Dirigente en Dalian.
					
					El Dirigente fue recibido tambien por los cuadros del partido y gobierno del centro, la provincia de Liaoning y la ciudad de Dalian, entre otros, Wang Min, secretario del Comite del PCCh en la Provincia de Liaoning, Wang Jiarui, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Liu Zhijun, ministro del Ferrocarril, Liu Hongcai, embajador de la RPCh en Corea, Chen Zhenggao, gobernador de la provincia de Liaoning, Xia Deren, secretario del Comite del PCCh en la ciudad de Dalian, y Li Wancai, alcalde de esta ciudad.
					
					El Dirigente departio con Li Keqiang.
					
					En representacion del Secretario General Hu Jintao, el CC del PCCh y el Consejo de Estado, Li Keqiang dio calida bienvenida al Dirigente quien visito la ciudad de Dalian visitada en 1983 por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					El hecho de que el Secretario General Kim Jong Il visito por quinta vez en el nuevo siglo a China demuestra directamente cuanto aprecia el la amistad Corea-China preparada por los dirigentes de vieja generacion de los dos paises, dijo Li Keqiang y valoro altamente el gran aporte del Dirigente por el incesante fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la amistad China-Corea.
					
					Bajo la guia del Dirigente, el pueblo coreano logro los exitos asombrosos en varios dominios como la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, la reunificacion de la patria y las actividades exteriores, subrayo y anadio que el pueblo chino esta muy contento al respecto y felicita sinceramente tales exitos considerandolos como los propios.
					
					Destacando que el colectivo de direccion central incluyendo al Secretario General Hu Jintao concede suma importancia a la amistad China-Corea, ratifico la invariable posicion del partido y el gobierno de China de consolidar incesantemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises. 
					
					El Dirigente expreso agradecimiento a los cuadros directivos y los habitantes de la provincia de Liaoning y la ciudad de Dalian quienes le acogieron cordialmente diciendo que se siente muy alegre de que a traves de esta visita, pueda presenciar directamente el aspecto desarrollado de la ciudad de Dalian que forja la nueva historia de modernizacion sobre la tierra china con una lucha perseverante. 
					
					Li Keqiang ofrecio un solemne banquete en honor del Dirigente.
					
					El Dirigente visito varias unidades guiado por Li Keqiang, Wang Min, Wang Jiarui, Liu Zhijun, Liu Hongcai, Chen Zhenggao, Xia Deren, Li Wancai, y otros cuadros directivos del centro, la provincia y ciudad mencionadas y disfruto el paisaje nocturno de la ciudad de Dalian que se va transformando considerablemente.
					
					Durante su visita sobre el Grupo Iceberg de Dalian, la Compania de Produccion de Locomotoras de Dalian, el Grupo de Pesqueria de Liaoning y el Grupo Industrial Dragon cubierto de Nieve de Dalian, formulo votos por los exitos de trabajo de los obreros de esas empresas en el proceso de modernizacion que edificaron una gran cantidad de grandes creaciones que quedaran en la historia de la patria.
					
					Me quede profundamente impresionado de los cambios acontecidos en la ciudad de Dalian que elimino el atraso secular y avanza vigorosa y armoniosamente en el nivel sofisticado, dijo el Dirigente y prosiguio que el desarrollo rapido de la region nordeste como esa ciudad comprueba patentemente la justeza y vitalidad de la estrategia del partido y el gobierno chinos de desarrollarla.
					
					En bienvenida a la visita del Dirigente a la ciudad de Dalian, Wang Min ofrecio un solemne banquete y la provincia de Liaoning y esta ciudad le dirigieron regalos. 
					
					El Dirigente agradecio a Li Keqiang, quien le acogio con amabilidad tras trasladarse, aunque estuvo muy ocupado, a la ciudad de Dalian muy lejos de la capital china, ofrecio un solemne banquete y facilito toda la comodidad acompanandole en todo el curso de la visita, y a los cuadros de la provincia y la ciudad por el trato hospitalario y sincero. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito la ciudad de Tianjin, una de las 4 ciudades bajo jurisdiccion central, situada al nordeste de la llanura de Huabei de China.
					
					Le acogieron el miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Tianjin, Zhang Gaoli, el alcalde de esta ciudad, Huang Xingguo y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la ciudad.
					
					 El Dirigente departio cordialmente con Zhang Gaoli.
					
					Zhang Gaoli dio calida bienvenida al Dirigente senalando que es un gran honor para la ciudad la nueva visita de el sobre esta urbe donde estan grabadas las sagradas huellas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, intimo amigo del pueblo chino.
					
					Anadio que la presente visita del Secretario General Kim Jong Il a China es un evento de historica importancia para el desarrollo de las relaciones de los dos paises y rindio sublime homenaje a el quien dedica todos sus esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales al fortalecimiento de la amistad China-Corea. 
					
					Tambien evaluo altamente los exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano en la lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y dio a conocer el estado de desarrollo de la ciudad de Tianjin.
					
					Guiado por Zhang Gaoli, Wang Jiarui, Huang Xingguo, Liu Hongcai y otros cuadros directivos del centro y de la ciudad, el Dirigente visito el puerto de Tianjin. 
					
					Tras recorrer el puerto convertido en uno moderno de gran dimension y la ciudad de Tianjin llena de vitalidad, el Dirigente evaluo altamente la transformacion irreconocible de esta urbe en unos anos y dio calidas felicitaciones a los funcionarios directivos y los trabajadores de la ciudad quienes alcanzaron magnificos exitos.
					
					Zhang Gaoli ofrecio un banquete suntuoso en una casa de huespedes de Estado para dar bienvenida a la visita a Tianjin del Dirigente.
					
					En todos los lugares, adonde llegaba el Dirigente, el fue acogido sincera y hospitalariamente por los habitantes chinos.
					
					En su recorrido por la zona nordeste de China, el Dirigente se informo en detalles del pensamiento y sentimiento del laborioso e inteligente pueblo chino y de la situacion de todos los sectores tales como la economia y la cultura.
					
					Esta visita extraoficial realizada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il para la consolidacion y el desarrollo incesantes de la amistad Corea-China se realizo exitosamente bajo la atencion especial y el trato cordial de Hu Jintao, el partido y el gobierno de China.
					
					El Dirigente expreso su satisfaccion por el resultado de la visita y agradecio sinceramente la calida hospitalidad de los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de China.
					
					En esta visita el Dirigente fue acompanado por el vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Yong Chun, los secretarios del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, el primer vicecanciller, Kang Sok Ju, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias al presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias al presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un telegrama de condolencias a su homologo de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, en relacion con que fallecio el presidente de este pais, Alhaji Umaru Musa Yaradua.
					En su misiva el remitente expresa profundas condolencias al destinatario, y por su conducto, al pueblo nigeriano y los familiares del difunto y desea que el gobierno y el pueblo de Nigeria logren el incesante desarrollo y prosperidad superando la tristeza.

articles.title: Enviadas ofrendas florales a la embajada nigeriana en Corea
articles.content:
Enviadas ofrendas florales a la embajada nigeriana en Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los Ministerios de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, de Seguridad del Pueblo, de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio Exterior, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y la Direccion de Servicios al Cuerpo Diplomatico enviaron el dia 7 las ofrendas florales a la Embajada de la Republica Federal de Nigeria en Corea en memoria de Alhaji Umaru Musa Yaradua, presidente de este pais africano.
					Las ofrendas florales fueron depositadas ante la foto del difunto.
					
					El vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS Yang Hyong Sop, el canciller Pak Ui Chun, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y titular de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Nigeria, Mun Jae Chol, y otros funcionarios coreanos visitaron la embajada nigeriana donde guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto y dejaron inscripciones en el libro de condolencias.
					
					El mismo dia, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises acreditados en Corea expresaron condolencias en la embajada nigeriana.

articles.title: Tendra lugar XIII Exposicion de Mercancias de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tendra lugar XIII Exposicion de Mercancias de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tendra lugar del 17 al 20 de mayo en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la 13a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang.
					Participaran en esta feria mas de 270 companias de Corea, China, Rusia, Alemania, Mongolia, Brasil, Suiza, Singapur, Australia, Austria, Italia, Indonesia, Tailandia, Cuba, Polonia y Taipei China.
					
					Estaran exhibidos mas de 85 mil productos de mas de 5 mil variedades, tales como, las maquinas herramientas CNC, los mecanismos electricos, los articulos electronicos y los de industria ligera, los alimentos, las necesidades diarias, los medicamentos y los vehiculos.
